section.title: VNC Console Options
section.para: When the VNC connection protocol is selected, the following options are available in the Console Options window.

listitem.para: Native Client: When you connect to the console of the virtual machine, a file download dialog provides you with a file that opens a console to the virtual machine via Remote Viewer.
noVNC: When you connect to the console of the virtual machine, a browser tab is opened that acts as the console.
Map control-alt-delete shortcut to ctrl+alt+end: Select this check box to map the CtrlAltDel key combination to CtrlAltEnd inside the virtual machine.
